titles.title: To authorize States and political subdivisions of States to control the movement of municipal solid waste generated within their jurisdictions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Authorizes a State or political subdivision to require that municipal solid waste generated within its jurisdiction be processed, composted, disposed of, or otherwise managed at a facility designated for such purpose if the designated facility is in compliance with Federal and State environmental laws and regulations.
